title: Some disjointness results
content: A few utility theorems on disjointness of classes.

blocks.name: bj-n0i
blocks.content: Inference associated with ~ n0 . Shortens ~ 2ndcdisj (2888>2878), ~ notzfaus (264>253). (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-disjcsn
blocks.content: A class is disjoint from its singleton. A consequence of regularity. Shorter proof than ~ bnj521 and does not depend on ~ df-ne . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-disjsn01
blocks.content: Disjointness of the singletons containing 0 and 1. This is a consequence of ~ bj-disjcsn but the present proof does not use regularity. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-2ex
bj-0nel1
blocks.content: The empty set does not belong to ` { 1o } ` . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-1nel0
blocks.content: ` 1o ` does not belong to ` { (/) } ` . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.)
